title: Gamera
description:
This Collection is unique in providing nearly EVERY AVAILABLE VERSION of EVERY movie! You have the original English-dub releases formatted for TV, and the newest releases, in high-resolution wide-screen, original Japanese soundtrack and English subtitles. See the file listing for a complete inventory, but most are provided here in THREE formats: original English-dub, hi-def dub, and hi-def subtitles. Most of the hi-def are Bluray quality rips. All subtitles are hardwired. (None of these rips are our own. Many thanks to the many dedicated rippers who posted these first.)

A couple of exceptions and apologies. The Ã¢â‚¬Å“HeiseiÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ series is here in stunning hi-def for the subtitle versions, but only the first seems to be available for a hi-def dubbed version. The second two are mp4 files, and although technically widescreen are rather lo-def. The most recent, 2006's Ã¢â‚¬Å“Gamera the BraveÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ does not seem to have been released in English at all, and there is only the single version of it here. 

Movie titles are the actual release names in English and Japanese; English versions by American International Pictures. The file naming convention also indicates the format of the movie, the order of release, and the year released.
